biotools.summary: Server  to calculate the folding nucleus for RNA molecules with known 3D structures-including pseudoknots, tRNAs, hairpins, and ribozymes-and for protein molecules with known 3D structures, as long as they are smaller than 200 amino acid residues.

bioschemas.name: FoldNucleus
bioschemas.summary: Server  to calculate the folding nucleus for RNA molecules with known 3D structures-including pseudoknots, tRNAs, hairpins, and ribozymes-and for protein molecules with known 3D structures, as long as they are smaller than 200 amino acid residues.
